org.yaml.snakeyaml.scanner

接口 Scanner

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ScannerImpl

    public interface Scanner
    This interface represents an input stream of Tokens.

    The parser and the scanner form together the 'Parse' step in the loading process (see chapter 3.1 of the YAML Specification).

    另请参阅:
    Token

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean checkToken(Token.ID... choices)
      Check if the next token is one of the given types.
      Token getToken()
      Returns the next token.
      Token peekToken()
      Return the next token, but do not delete it from the stream.

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkToken

        boolean checkToken(Token.ID... choices)
        Check if the next token is one of the given types.
        参数:
        choices - token IDs.
        返回:
        true if the next token can be assigned to a variable of at least one of the given types. Returns false if no more tokens are available.
        抛出:
        ScannerException - Thrown in case of malformed input.

      • peekToken

        Token peekToken()
        Return the next token, but do not delete it from the stream.
        返回:
        The token that will be returned on the next call to getToken()
        抛出:
        ScannerException - Thrown in case of malformed input.

      • getToken

        Token getToken()
        Returns the next token.

        The token will be removed from the stream.

        返回:
        the coming token
        抛出:
        ScannerException - Thrown in case of malformed input.
